turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Emma, can you get me a frappucino from starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure which flavor do you want this time?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I'll go with Caramel, less calories, ha!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good choice, shall we stick with grande?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take a venti actually.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And which kind of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I'll have 2%.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok...are you sure you don't want almond, I thought you were avoiding dairy?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: My IBS has been better so I think I'd like the real milk this time.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing. What about whipped cream, do you want it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hell to the yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Well, just checking.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You know me well enough Emma!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok and shall I get that from the drive through in Apex?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, the one along highway 64.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok I've just put that order in and I'll head over to pick it up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks Emma.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else you need today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, but it's nothing you can give me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Cryptic as usual! Bye!
